callTypes.name: Technical Interview
callTypes.description:
This is a technical interview to assess candidate skills.

Focus on both technical depth and communication.

callTypes.name: Sales Call
callTypes.description:
Sales call with potential client.

Focus on understanding needs and presenting solutions.

callTypes.name: 1 - 1 Buddy call
callTypes.description: A weekly sync up call with buddy who have joined recently. To know how they are doing, any difficulties they are facing, helping them with their learning planner
